t: Brandless, the pioneering Amazon alternative, shuts down
s: February 10, 2020 - Today, just two and a half years after it launched, the online store Brandless is shutting down. The company, which sold simply branded household, personal care, baby, and pet products on the cheap, is no longer taking orders and has laid off 70 people.
